high_descs: Turn around and turn to the right to face the dresser.
Pick up the disc from the dresser.
Turn around and cross the room and turn right to face the night stand on the left side of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on while holding a disc.

high_descs: Turn around, head to the dresser
Take the CD from the dresser
Turn around, head across the room, go to the right
Turn on the lamp in the corner
anns.task_desc: Pick up the CD, turn on the lamp in the corner

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the CD on the dresser on your right.
Pick up the CD from the dresser.
Turn left and walk to the lamp on the night stand to the left of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Examine a CD by the light of a night stand lamp.
